name: Spades Solitaire Classic Plus
description:
Spades is a trick-taking card game devised in the United States in the 1930s. It can be played as either a partnership or solo game.

Features:
+ Extensive Statistics
+ Achievements for endless fun
+ Challenging and competitive artificial-intelligence opponents
+ Realistic look and feel
+ Automatic game saving, just in case you get a call right before you achieve your blind nil bid
+ Simple tutorial to help beginners get in the game fast
+ Game options
+ Free!
